message: This is a high-quality product worth $1250000. I'm offering it to you for $1000000, a 20% discount. If you don't buy it, I'll have to sell it to someone else, and you'll miss out on a great deal.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of this product and appreciate the discount. I will take it.

I'm offering you a unique opportunity to purchase this product for $1000000. It's a rare chance to acquire a product that's worth $0 to you, but it will only cost you $1000000. I'm willing to take a loss on this one, but I think you'll find it's a great value.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but given that the product is of low quality, I believe it's best to pass on this opportunity.

I've got a great deal for you! This product is a high-quality item, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. That's a 28% discount from its true value. I'm confident you'll be happy with this purchase, and I'm willing to make a concession to ensure you take it home today.
Alice, thank you for the generous discount. Considering the quality of the product, I believe this is a fair deal and I will take it.

I've got another high-quality product here, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. I know you've been pleased with the previous purchases, and I'm confident this one will meet your expectations as well. It's a great opportunity to add another valuable item to your collection.

Alice, while I appreciate the offer, even a free item might exceed our current needs or budget constraints. I'll pass on this opportunity to focus on other priorities.

I've got another high-quality product here, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. I know you've been looking for a good deal, and I'm confident this one meets your requirements. I'm not willing to go any lower on the price, but I'm willing to throw in a special service to sweeten the deal: I'll provide a 5-year warranty on the product, which is usually a $200000 value. That's a total value of $1200000 for just $1000000.
Alice, the warranty you're offering makes this deal very attractive. Considering the quality of the product and the additional value, I will take it. Thank you for the comprehensive offer.
